markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Glue Bullet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1195)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 170</row>

**Price** 16 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** round

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These cartridges are filled with sticky clear glue. When a glue bullet hits, a syrupy webbing coats the target and sticks to the ground or a nearby surface, hindering their movement. The target takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 2d4 rounds, or until it [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) against a DC of 18. On a critical hit, the target is also [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) until it Escapes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Glue Bullet
